blockProperties.name: Available
blockProperties.description: Returns true if there is a microphone available to listen with.

blockProperties.name: Enabled
blockProperties.description: Set whether or not the Sound Pressure Level is enabled and listening.

blockProperties.name: ListenIntervalMilliseconds
blockProperties.description: Set the interval of time to listen in milliseconds.

blockProperties.name: SoundPressureLevel
blockProperties.description: Gets the last measured sound pressure level in decibels.

name: SoundPressureLevel
helpString: Non-visible component that can collect sound pressure level data

events.name: SoundPressureLevelChanged
events.description: Event that is called on a set time period to update the sound pressure level.

events.name: WeightedSoundPressureLevelChanged
events.description: Event that is called on a set time period to update the sound pressure level.
